reference.shortdesc: The groupchoice element provides a set of choices between groups of pieces of syntax.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: Each syntax group is a logical set of pieces of syntax that go together. A group choice specifies that the user must make a choice about which part of the syntax to use. Groups are often nested.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The groupchoice element is specialized from figgroup. It is defined in the syntax diagram domain module, which is a specialization of the programming domain module.
